name: Wilico Wireless Networking Solutions
overview: Wilico Wireless Networking Solutions S.A. develops electronic equipment and software tools that help in the creation and management of advanced mobile applications. The company offers Wilico Platform, a tool that is used to create mobile marketing campaigns. Its hardware products include Wilico B200, basic access point featuring an LCD screen that allows the distribution of multimedia content to mobile phones using Bluetooth or Wi- Fi; Wilico B200A, access point that allows the distribution of multimedia content to mobile phones using Bluetooth or Wi-Fi; and Wilico B200TS, an interactive touch screen that allows the distribution of several multimedia contents to mobile phones via Bluetooth and Wi-Fi. The companyâ€™s products also include Wilico Suite B500, a software package, which helps in the management and remote modification of multimedia content of communication campaigns by means of proximity channels using short range wireless technology, such as Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, and NFC; and Wimob, a software as a service that allows Internet users to transfer a multimedia content on a Website from a PC to a mobile phone. Its products are used to make direct marketing campaigns, relational marketing, and emotional marketing using the mobile phone of the consumer in scenarios, such as the point of sale, outdoor advertising, or tourist areas. The companyâ€™s customers include mobile operators, retail companies, brands, publicity agencies, media groups and software integrators, content creators, official organisms and real-state owners, and publishers and bloggers. Wilico Wireless Networking Solutions S.A. was founded in 2003 and is based in Barcelona, Spain.
